detaileddescription.para: Comprehensive error enumeration for all NVS operations in the system. This enumeration is used across all NVS-related classes to provide consistent error reporting and handling.

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for Non-Volatile Storage implementations in the HardFOC system.

detaileddescription.para: This header-only file defines the abstract base class for non-volatile storage that provides a consistent API across different storage implementations. Concrete implementations for various storage devices inherit from this class to provide key-value storage, settings persistence, and configuration management.

simplesect.para: This is a header-only abstract base class following the same pattern as BaseCan.
Users should program against this interface, not specific implementations.
